   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File: ct_error_SUITE
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Description: 
   25: %%% Test various errors in Common Test suites.
   26: %%%
   27: %%% The suites used for the test are located in the data directory.
   28: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: -module(ct_hooks_SUITE).
   30: 
   31: -compile(export_all).
   32: 
   33: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   34: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   35: -include_lib("kernel/src/logger_internal.hrl").
   36: 
   37: -define(eh, ct_test_support_eh).
   38: 
   39: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   40: %% TEST SERVER CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
   41: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   42: 
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: %% Description: Since Common Test starts another Test Server
   45: %% instance, the tests need to be performed on a separate node (or
   46: %% there will be clashes with logging processes etc).
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   49:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
   50:     TestDir = filename:join(DataDir,"cth/tests/"),
   51:     CTHs = filelib:wildcard(filename:join(TestDir,"*_cth.erl")),
   52:     io:format("CTHs: ~p",[CTHs]),
   53:     [io:format("Compiling ~p: ~p",
   54: 	    [FileName,compile:file(FileName,[{outdir,TestDir},debug_info])]) ||
   55: 	FileName <- CTHs],
   56:     ct_test_support:init_per_suite([{path_dirs,[TestDir]} | Config]).
   57: 
   58: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   59:     ct_test_support:end_per_suite(Config).
   60: 
   61: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   62:     ct_test_support:init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   63: 
   64: 
   65: end_per_testcase(cth_log_formatter = TestCase, Config) ->
   66:     ct_test_support:ct_rpc(
   67:       {logger,set_handler_config,
   68:        [default, formatter,
   69:         {?DEFAULT_FORMATTER,?DEFAULT_FORMAT_CONFIG}]}, Config),
   70:     ct_test_support:end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config);
   71: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   72:     ct_test_support:end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   73: 
   74: 
   75: suite() ->
   76:     [{timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   77: 
   78: all() ->
   79:     all(suite).
   80: 
   81: all(suite) ->
   82:     lists:reverse(
   83:       [
   84:        crash_groups, crash_all, bad_return_groups, bad_return_all,
   85:        illegal_values_groups, illegal_values_all, alter_groups, alter_all,
   86:        alter_all_to_skip, alter_all_from_skip,
   87:        one_cth, two_cth, faulty_cth_no_init, faulty_cth_id_no_init,
   88:        faulty_cth_exit_in_init, faulty_cth_exit_in_id,
   89:        faulty_cth_exit_in_init_scope_suite, minimal_cth,
   90:        minimal_and_maximal_cth, faulty_cth_undef,
   91:        scope_per_suite_cth, scope_per_group_cth, scope_suite_cth,
   92:        scope_suite_group_only_cth,
   93:        scope_per_suite_state_cth, scope_per_group_state_cth,
   94:        scope_suite_state_cth,
   95:        fail_pre_suite_cth, double_fail_pre_suite_cth,
   96:        fail_post_suite_cth, skip_pre_suite_cth, skip_pre_end_cth,
   97:        skip_pre_init_tc_cth, fail_post_init_tc_cth,
   98:        skip_post_suite_cth, recover_post_suite_cth, update_config_cth,
   99:        state_update_cth, update_result_cth, options_cth, same_id_cth,
  100:        fail_n_skip_with_minimal_cth, prio_cth, no_config,
  101:        no_init_suite_config, no_init_config, no_end_config,
  102:        failed_sequence, repeat_force_stop, config_clash,
  103:        callbacks_on_skip, fallback, data_dir,
  104:        cth_log, cth_log_formatter, cth_log_unexpect
  105:       ]
  106:     ).
  107: 
  108: 
  109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  110: %% TEST CASES
  111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: 
  113: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  114: %%% 
  115: one_cth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     do_test(one_empty_cth, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[empty_cth], Config).
  117: 
  118: two_cth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  119:     do_test(two_empty_cth, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[empty_cth,empty_cth],
  120: 	    Config).
  121: 
  122: faulty_cth_no_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  123:     do_test(faulty_cth_no_init, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[askjhdkljashdkaj],
  124: 	    Config,{error,"Failed to start CTH, see the "
  125: 		   "CT Log for details"}).
  126: 
  127: faulty_cth_id_no_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  128:     do_test(faulty_cth_id_no_init, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[id_no_init_cth],
  129: 	    Config,{error,"Failed to start CTH, see the "
  130: 		   "CT Log for details"}).
  131:

  133:     do_test(minimal_cth, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[minimal_cth],Config).
  134:

  138:

  146: 	    [],Config).
  147:

  153:

  158: 	     "CT Log for details"}).
  159:

  272: 
  273: cth_log(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  274:     %% test that cth_log_redirect writes properly to
  275:     %% html I/O log
  276:     ct:timetrap({minutes,10}),
  277:     StartOpts = do_test(cth_log, "cth_log_SUITE.erl", [], Config),
  278:     Logdir = proplists:get_value(logdir, StartOpts),
  279:     TCLogs =
  280: 	filelib:wildcard(
  281: 	  filename:join(Logdir,
  282: 			"ct_run*/cth.tests*/run*/cth_log_suite.tc*.html")),
  283:     lists:foreach(
  284:       fun(TCLog) ->
  285: 	      {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(TCLog),
  286: 	      Ts = string:lexemes(binary_to_list(Bin),[$\n]),
  287: 	      Matches = lists:foldl(fun("=ERROR"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  288: 					    {E+1,I,N,L};
  289: 				       ("=INFO"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  290: 					    {E,I+1,N,L};
  291: 				       ("=NOTICE"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  292: 					    {E,I,N+1,L};
  293: 				       ("Logger"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  294: 					    {E,I,N,L+1};
  295: 				       (_, N) -> N
  296: 				    end, {0,0,0,0}, Ts),
  297: 	      ct:pal("~p ({Error,Info,Notice,Log}) matches in ~tp",
  298:                      [Matches,TCLog]),
  299:               MatchList = tuple_to_list(Matches),
  300:               case [N || N <- MatchList, N<1] of
  301:                   [] -> ok;
  302:                   _ -> exit({missing_io,TCLog})
  303: 	      end
  304:       end, TCLogs),
  305:     ok.
  306: 
  307: cth_log_formatter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  308:     %% test that cth_log_redirect writes properly to
  309:     %% html I/O log using the formatter
  310:     ct:timetrap({minutes,10}),
  311:     ct_test_support:ct_rpc({logger,set_handler_config,[default, formatter,
  312:                               {logger_formatter,#{ template => [level,":",msg,"\n"] }}]},
  313:                            Config),
  314:     StartOpts = do_test(cth_log_formatter, "cth_log_formatter_SUITE.erl", [], Config),
  315:     Logdir = proplists:get_value(logdir, StartOpts),
  316:     TCLogs =
  317: 	filelib:wildcard(
  318: 	  filename:join(Logdir,
  319: 			"ct_run*/cth.tests*/run*/cth_log_formatter_suite.tc*.html")),
  320:     lists:foreach(
  321:       fun(TCLog) ->
  322: 	      {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(TCLog),
  323: 	      Ts = string:lexemes(binary_to_list(Bin),[$\n]),
  324: 	      Matches = lists:foldl(fun("error:"++_,  {E,N,L}) ->
  325: 					    {E+1,N,L};
  326: 				       ("notice:"++_,  {E,N,L}) ->
  327: 					    {E,N+1,L};
  328: 				       ("Logger"++_,  {E,N,L}) ->
  329: 					    {E,N,L+1};
  330: 				       (_, N) -> N
  331: 				    end, {0,0,0}, Ts),
  332: 	      ct:pal("~p ({Error,Notice,Log}) matches in ~tp",
  333:                      [Matches,TCLog]),
  334:               MatchList = tuple_to_list(Matches),
  335:               case [N || N <- MatchList, N<1] of
  336:                   [] -> ok;
  337:                   _ -> exit({missing_io,TCLog})
  338: 	      end
  339:       end, TCLogs),
  340:     ok.
  341: 
  342: cth_log_unexpect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  343:     %% test that cth_log_redirect writes properly to
  344:     %% unexpected I/O log
  345:     ct:timetrap({minutes,10}),
  346:     StartOpts = do_test(cth_log_unexpect, "cth_log_unexpect_SUITE.erl", [], Config),
  347:     Logdir = proplists:get_value(logdir, StartOpts),
  348:     UnexpIoLogs =
  349: 	filelib:wildcard(
  350: 	  filename:join(Logdir,
  351: 			"ct_run*/cth.tests*/run*/unexpected_io.log.html")),
  352:     lists:foreach(
  353:       fun(UnexpIoLog) ->
  354: 	      {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(UnexpIoLog),
  355: 	      Ts = string:lexemes(binary_to_list(Bin),[$\n]),
  356: 	      Matches = lists:foldl(fun("=ERROR"++_,  {E,I,L}) ->
  357: 					    {E+1,I,L};
  358: 				       ("=INFO"++_,  {E,I,L}) ->
  359: 					    {E,I+1,L};
  360: 				       ("Logger"++_,  {E,I,L}) ->
  361: 					    {E,I,L+1};
  362: 				       (_, N) -> N
  363: 				    end, {0,0,0}, Ts),
  364: 	      ct:pal("~p ({Error,Info,Log}) matches in ~tp",
  365:                      [Matches,UnexpIoLog]),
  366:               MatchList = tuple_to_list(Matches),
  367:               case [N || N <- MatchList, N<3] of
  368:                   [] -> ok;
  369:                   _ -> exit({missing_unexpected_io,UnexpIoLog})
  370: 	      end
  371:       end, UnexpIoLogs),
  372:     ok.
  373: 
  374: %% OTP-10599 adds the Suite argument as first argument to all hook
  375: %% callbacks that did not have a Suite argument from before. This test
  376: %% checks that ct_hooks will fall back to old versions of callbacks if
  377: %% new versions are not exported.
  378: fallback(Config) ->
  379:     do_test(fallback, "all_hook_callbacks_SUITE.erl",[fallback_cth], Config).
  380: 
  381: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when tests
  382: %% are skipped in different ways
  383: callbacks_on_skip(Config) ->
  384:     do_test(callbacks_on_skip, {spec,"skip.spec"},[skip_cth], Config).
  385: 
  386: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when tests
  387: %% are skipped due to failed sequence
  388: failed_sequence(Config) ->
  389:     do_test(failed_sequence, "seq_SUITE.erl", [skip_cth], Config).
  390: 
  391: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when tests
  392: %% are skipped due to {force_stop,skip_rest} option
  393: repeat_force_stop(Config) ->
  394:     do_test(repeat_force_stop, "repeat_SUITE.erl", [skip_cth], Config, ok, 2,
  395:             [{force_stop,skip_rest},{duration,"000009"}]).
  396: 
  397: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when a test
  398: %% fails due to clash in config alias names
  399: config_clash(Config) ->
  400:     do_test(config_clash, "config_clash_SUITE.erl", [skip_cth], Config).
  401: 
  402: %% Test post_groups and post_all hook callbacks, introduced by OTP-14746
  403: alter_groups(Config) ->
  404:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  405:                          [{post_groups_return,[{new_group,[tc1,tc2]}]},
  406:                           {post_all_return,[{group,new_group}]}],Config),
  407:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  408:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  409: 
  410: alter_all(Config) ->
  411:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_all_return,[tc2]}],Config),
  412:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  413:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  414: 
  415: alter_all_from_skip(Config) ->
  416:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{all_return,{skip,"skipped by all/0"}},
  417:                                          {post_all_return,[tc2]}],Config),
  418:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  419:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  420: 
  421: alter_all_to_skip(Config) ->
  422:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  423:                          [{post_all_return,{skip,"skipped by post_all/3"}}],
  424:                          Config),
  425:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  426:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  427: 
  428: bad_return_groups(Config) ->
  429:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_groups_return,not_a_list}],
  430:                          Config),
  431:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  432:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  433: 
  434: bad_return_all(Config) ->
  435:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_all_return,not_a_list}],
  436:                          Config),
  437:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  438:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  439: 
  440: illegal_values_groups(Config) ->
  441:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  442:                          [{post_groups_return,[{new_group,[this_test_does_not_exist]},
  443:                                           this_is_not_a_group_def]}],
  444:                          Config),
  445:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  446:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  447: 
  448: illegal_values_all(Config) ->
  449:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  450:                          [{post_all_return,[{group,this_group_does_not_exist},
  451:                                        {this_is_not_a_valid_term}]}],
  452:                          Config),
  453:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  454:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  455: 
  456: crash_groups(Config) ->
  457:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_groups_return,crash}],Config),
  458:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  459:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  460: 
  461: crash_all(Config) ->
  462:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_all_return,crash}],Config),
  463:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  464:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  465: 
  466: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  467: %%% HELP FUNCTIONS
  468: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  469: 
  470: do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config) ->
  471:     do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, ok).
  472: do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, {error,_} = Res) ->
  473:     do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, Res, 1,[]);
  474: do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, Res) ->
  475:     do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, Res, 2,[]).
  476: 
  477: do_test(Tag, WhatToTest, CTHs, Config, Res, EC, ExtraOpts) when is_list(WhatToTest) ->
  478:     do_test(Tag, {suite,WhatToTest}, CTHs, Config, Res, EC, ExtraOpts);
  479: do_test(Tag, {WhatTag,Wildcard}, CTHs, Config, Res, EC, ExtraOpts) ->
  480:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  481:     Files = filelib:wildcard(
  482:                filename:join([DataDir,"cth/tests",Wildcard])),
  483:     {Opts,ERPid} =
  484:         setup([{WhatTag,Files},{ct_hooks,CTHs},{label,Tag}|ExtraOpts], Config),
  485: 
  486:     Res = ct_test_support:run(Opts, Config),
  487:     Events = ct_test_support:get_events(ERPid, Config),
  488: 
  489:     ct_test_support:log_events(Tag,
  490: 			       reformat(Events, ?eh),
  491: 			       ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  492: 			       Opts),
  493: 
  494:     TestEvents = events_to_check(Tag, EC),
  495:     ok = ct_test_support:verify_events(TestEvents, Events, Config),
  496:     Opts.
  497: 
  498: setup(Test, Config) ->
  499:     Opts0 = ct_test_support:get_opts(Config),
  500:     Level = ?config(trace_level, Config),
  501:     EvHArgs = [{cbm,ct_test_support},{trace_level,Level}],
  502:     Opts = Opts0 ++ [{event_handler,{?eh,EvHArgs}}|Test],
  503:     ERPid = ct_test_support:start_event_receiver(Config),
  504:     {Opts,ERPid}.
  505: 
  506: reformat(Events, EH) ->
  507:     ct_test_support:reformat(Events, EH).
  508: %reformat(Events, _EH) ->
  509: %    Events.
  510: 
  511: gen_config(Name,KeyVals,Config) ->
  512:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  513:     File = filename:join(PrivDir,atom_to_list(Name)++".cfg"),
  514:     ok = file:write_file(File,[io_lib:format("~p.~n",[{Key,Value}])
  515:                                || {Key,Value} <- KeyVals]),
  516:     File.
  517: 
  518: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  519: %%% TEST EVENTS
  520: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  521: events_to_check(Test) ->
  522:     %% 2 tests (ct:run_test + script_start) is default
  523:     events_to_check(Test, 2).
  524: 
  525: events_to_check(_, 0) ->
  526:     [];
  527: events_to_check(Test, N) ->
  528:     test_events(Test) ++ events_to_check(Test, N-1).
  529: 
  530: test_events(one_empty_cth) ->
  531:     [
  532:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  533:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  534:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,id,[[]]}},
  535:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,init,[{'_','_','_'},[]]}},
  536:      %% check that post_groups and post_all comes after init when hook
  537:      %% is installed with start flag/option.
  538:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_groups,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,[]]}},
  539:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_all,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,[test_case],[]]}},
  540:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
  541:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_suite,
  542: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
  543:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_init_per_suite,
  544: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist','$proplist',[]]}},
  545:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
  546:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case}},
  547:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},
  548:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_init_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  549:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},
  550:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  551:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
  552: 
  553:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,end_per_suite}},
  554:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_suite,
  555: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
  556:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_suite,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  557:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}},
  558:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
  559:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,terminate,[[]]}},
  560:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
  561:     ];
  562:

  750: test_events(scope_suite_cth) ->
  751:     [
  752:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  753:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  754:      %% check that post_groups and post_all comes before init when hook
  755:      %% is installed in suite/0
  756:      %% And there should be no terminate after these, since init is
  757:      %% not yet called.
  758:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_groups,['_',[]]}},
  759:      {negative,
  760:       {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,['_']}},
  761:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_all,['_','_',[]]}}},
  762:      {negative,
  763:       {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,['_']}},
  764:       {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite}}},
  765:      {?eh,cth,{'_',id,[[]]}},
  766:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
  767:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_suite,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},

  769:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
  770: 
  771:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,test_case}},
  772:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},

  775: 
  776:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,end_per_suite}},

  778:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_suite,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,'$proplist','_',[]]}},

  785: test_events(scope_suite_group_only_cth) ->
  786:     Suite = ct_scope_suite_group_only_cth_SUITE,
  787:     CTH = empty_cth,
  788:     [
  789:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  790:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  791:      {?eh,start_info,{1,1,1}},
  792:      %% check that post_groups and post_all comes before init when hook
  793:      %% is installed in suite/0
  794:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_groups,['_',['_']]}},
  795:      {negative,
  796:       {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_all,['_','_','_']}},
  797:       {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,init_per_suite}}},
  798:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,id,[[]]}},
  799:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,init,['_',[]]}},
  800:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,pre_init_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist',mystate]}},
  801:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_init_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist','$proplist',mystate]}},
  802:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,init_per_suite,ok}},
  803: 
  804:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,end_per_suite}},
  805:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,pre_end_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist',mystate]}},
  806:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_end_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist','_',mystate]}},
  807:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,terminate,[mystate]}},
  808:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,end_per_suite,ok}},
  809:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
  810:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
  811:     ];
  812: 
  813: test_events(scope_per_group_cth) ->
  814:     [
  815:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  816:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  817:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
  818:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
  819: 
  820:      [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{init_per_group,group1,[]}}},
  821:       {?eh,cth,{'_',id,[[]]}},
  822:       {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
  823:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_group,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,group1, '$proplist','$proplist',[]]}},
  824:       {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{init_per_group,group1,[]},ok}},
  825: 
  826:       {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case}},
  827:       {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},
  828:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_testcase,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',ok,[]]}},
  829:       {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
  830: 
  831:       {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{end_per_group,group1,[]}}},
  832:       {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_end_per_group,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,group1,'$proplist',[]]}},
  833:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_group,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,group1,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  834:       {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[[]]}},
  835:       {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{end_per_group,group1,[]},ok}}],
  836: 
  837:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,end_per_suite}},
  838:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}},
  839:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
  840:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}

 1150:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_fail,
 1151:                [ct_fail_init_tc_SUITE,test_case,
 1152:                 "Changed skip to fail in post_init_per_testcase",
 1153:                 []]}},
 1154:      {?eh,test_stats,{0,1,{0,0}}},
 1155:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_fail_init_tc_SUITE,end_per_suite}},
 1156:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_suite,[ct_fail_init_tc_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
 1157:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_suite,
 1158:                [ct_fail_init_tc_SUITE,'$proplist',ok,[]]}},
 1159:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_fail_init_tc_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}},
 1160:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
 1161:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,terminate,[[]]}},
 1162:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 1163:     ];

 1174: 					{'EXIT',{'_','_'}},[]]}},
 1175:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,init_per_suite,ok}},
 1176:

 1179: 	       [Suite,test_case, not_contains([tc_status]),[]]}},

 1181: 	       [Suite,test_case, contains([tc_status]),'_',[]]}},

 1186: 	       [Suite,not_contains([tc_status]),[]]}},

 1190:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},

 1192:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 1193:     ];

 1325: 				 {not_in_order,

 1330: 				 },

 1332: 				 post_init_per_suite,pre_init_per_suite,
 1333: 				 init])]}},
 1334:      {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[contains(
 1335: 				[post_end_per_suite,pre_end_per_suite,
 1336: 				 post_end_per_group,pre_end_per_group,
 1337: 				 {not_in_order,

 1340: 				   pre_init_per_testcase,on_tc_fail,

 1344: 				 post_init_per_suite,pre_init_per_suite,
 1345: 				 init]
 1346: 			       )]}},

 1348:     ];

 1518: test_events(fail_n_skip_with_minimal_cth) ->
 1519:     [{?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 1520:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
 1521:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
 1522:      {?eh,tc_start,{'_',init_per_suite}},
 1523: 
 1524:      {parallel,
 1525:       [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1526: 						      group1,[parallel]}}},
 1527:        {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1528: 						     group1,[parallel]},ok}},
 1529:        {parallel,
 1530: 	[{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1531: 							group2,[parallel]}}},
 1532: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1533: 						       group2,[parallel]},ok}},
 1534: 	 %% Verify that 'skip' as well as 'skipped' works
 1535: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case2}},
 1536: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case2,{skipped,"skip it"}}},
 1537: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case3}},
 1538: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case3,{skipped,"skip it"}}},
 1539: 	 {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,[ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,
 1540:                                          {test_case2,group2},
 1541: 					 {tc_user_skip,"skip it"},
 1542: 					 []]}},
 1543: 	 {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,[ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,
 1544:                                          {test_case3,group2},
 1545: 					 {tc_user_skip,"skip it"},
 1546: 					 []]}},
 1547: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,
 1548: 							group2,[parallel]}}},
 1549: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,group2,
 1550: 						       [parallel]},ok}}]},
 1551:        {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,
 1552: 						      group1,[parallel]}}},
 1553:        {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,
 1554: 						     group1,[parallel]},ok}}]},
 1555: 
 1556:      {?eh,tc_done,{'_',end_per_suite,ok}},
 1557:      {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[[]]}},
 1558:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 1559:     ];
 1560: 
 1561: test_events(prio_cth) ->
 1562:     GenPre = fun(Func,States) when Func==pre_init_per_suite;
 1563:                                    Func==pre_end_per_suite ->
 1564: 		     [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_',State]}} ||
 1565:                          State <- States];
 1566:                 (Func,States) ->
 1567: 		     [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_','_',State]}} ||
 1568: 			 State <- States]
 1569: 	     end,
 1570: 
 1571:     GenPost = fun(Func,States) when Func==post_init_per_suite;
 1572:                                     Func==post_end_per_suite ->
 1573: 		      [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_','_',State]}} ||
 1574: 			  State <- States];
 1575:                  (Func,States) ->
 1576: 		      [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_','_','_',State]}} ||
 1577: 			  State <- States]
 1578: 
 1579:               end,
 1580: 
 1581:     [{?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 1582:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}}] ++
 1583: 
 1584: 	[{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,init_per_suite}}] ++
 1585: 	GenPre(pre_init_per_suite,
 1586: 	       [[1100,100],[800],[900],[1000],[1200,1050],[1100],[1200]]) ++
 1587: 	GenPost(post_init_per_suite,
 1588: 		[[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],[900],[1000],
 1589: 		 [1200,1050],[1100],[1200]]) ++
 1590: 	[{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
 1591: 
 1592: 
 1593: 	 [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{init_per_group,'_',[]}}}] ++
 1594: 	     GenPre(pre_init_per_group,
 1595: 		    [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],
 1596: 		     [900],[1000],[1200,1050],[1100],[1200]]) ++
 1597: 	     GenPost(post_init_per_group,
 1598: 		     [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1599: 		      [900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1600: 		      [1100],[1200]]) ++
 1601: 	     [{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{init_per_group,'_',[]},ok}}] ++
 1602: 
 1603: 	     [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,test_case}}] ++
 1604: 	     GenPre(pre_init_per_testcase,
 1605: 		    [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1606: 		     [900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1607: 		     [1100],[1200]]) ++
 1608: 	     GenPost(post_end_per_testcase,
 1609: 		     lists:reverse(
 1610: 		       [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1611: 			[900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1612: 			[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1613: 	     [{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
 1614: 
 1615: 	      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{end_per_group,'_',[]}}}] ++
 1616: 	     GenPre(pre_end_per_group,
 1617: 		    lists:reverse(
 1618: 		      [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1619: 		       [900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1620: 		       [1100],[1200]])) ++
 1621: 	     GenPost(post_end_per_group,
 1622: 		     lists:reverse(
 1623: 		       [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1624: 			[900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1625: 			[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1626: 	     [{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{end_per_group,'_',[]},ok}}],
 1627: 
 1628: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,end_per_suite}}] ++
 1629: 	GenPre(pre_end_per_suite,
 1630: 	       lists:reverse(
 1631: 		 [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],[900],[1000],
 1632: 		  [1200,1050],[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1633: 	GenPost(post_end_per_suite,
 1634: 		lists:reverse(
 1635: 		  [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],[900],[1000],
 1636: 		   [1200,1050],[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1637: 	[{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}},
 1638: 	 {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
 1639: 	 {?eh,stop_logging,[]}];
 1640:

 1890:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_framework,end_per_suite}},
 1891:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_suite,
 1892: 	       [ct_data_dir_SUITE,'$proplist',[{data_dir_name,"ct_data_dir_SUITE_data"}]]}},
 1893:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_suite,
 1894: 	       [ct_data_dir_SUITE,'$proplist',ok,[{data_dir_name,"ct_data_dir_SUITE_data"}]]}},
 1895:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_framework,end_per_suite,ok}},
 1896:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
 1897:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 1898:     ];

 2029: test_events(callbacks_on_skip) ->
 2030:     %% skip_cth.erl will send a 'cth_error' event if a hook is
 2031:     %% erroneously called. Therefore, all Events are changed to
 2032:     %% {negative,{?eh,cth_error,'_'},Event}
 2033:     %% at the end of this function.
 2034:     Events =
 2035:         [
 2036:          {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 2037:          {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
 2038:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,id,[[]]}},

 2040:          {?eh,start_info,{6,6,15}},
 2041: 
 2042:          %% all_hook_callbacks_SUITE is skipped in spec
 2043:          %% Only the on_tc_skip callback shall be called
 2044:          {?eh,tc_user_skip,{all_hook_callbacks_SUITE,all,"Skipped in spec"}},
 2045:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,
 2046:                    [all_hook_callbacks_SUITE,all,
 2047:                     {tc_user_skip,"Skipped in spec"},
 2048:                     []]}},
 2049:          {?eh,test_stats,{0,0,{1,0}}},
 2050:

 2052:          %% No group- or testcase-functions shall be called.
 2053:          {?eh,tc_start,{skip_init_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
 2054:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_suite,
 2055:                    [skip_init_SUITE,
 2056:                     '$proplist',
 2057:                     []]}},

 2462: test_events(failed_sequence) ->
 2463:     %% skip_cth.erl will send a 'cth_error' event if a hook is
 2464:     %% erroneously called. Therefore, all Events are changed to

 2703:                 [{new_group,[this_test_does_not_exist]},
 2704:                  this_is_not_a_group_def]]}},
 2705:      {?eh,start_info,{1,0,0}},
 2706:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_groups,
 2707:                [all_and_groups_SUITE,
 2708:                 [{new_group,[this_test_does_not_exist]},
 2709:                  this_is_not_a_group_def]]}},
 2710:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_framework,error_in_suite}},

 2822: 
 2823: test_events(ok) ->
 2824:     ok.
 2825: 
 2826: %% test events help functions
 2827: contains(List) ->
 2828:     fun(Proplist) when is_list(Proplist) ->
 2829: 	    contains(List,Proplist)
 2830:     end.
 2831: 
 2832: contains([{not_in_order,List}|T],Rest) ->
 2833:     contains_parallel(List,Rest),
 2834:     contains(T,Rest);
 2835: contains([{Ele,Pos}|T] = L,[H|T2]) ->
 2836:     case element(Pos,H) of
 2837: 	Ele ->
 2838: 	    contains(T,T2);
 2839: 	_ ->
 2840: 	    contains(L,T2)
 2841:     end;
 2842: contains([Ele|T],[{Ele,_}|T2])->
 2843:     contains(T,T2);
 2844: contains([Ele|T],[Ele|T2])->
 2845:     contains(T,T2);
 2846: contains(List,[_|T]) ->
 2847:     contains(List,T);
 2848: contains([],_) ->
 2849:     match.
 2850: 
 2851: contains_parallel([Key | T], Elems) ->
 2852:     contains([Key],Elems),
 2853:     contains_parallel(T,Elems);
 2854: contains_parallel([],_Elems) ->
 2855:     match.
 2856: 
 2857: not_contains(List) ->
 2858:     fun(Proplist) when is_list(Proplist) ->
 2859: 	    [] = [Ele || {Ele,_} <- Proplist,
 2860: 			 Test <- List,
 2861: 			 Test =:= Ele]
 2862:     end.
